com.redhat.rhn.common.security.acl
Class BaseHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.common.security.acl.BaseHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
AclHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
Access, ActivationKeyAclHandler, BaseHandlerTest.TestHandler, ChannelAclHandler, ConfigAclHandler, ErrataAclHandler, KickstartAclHandler, MonitoringAclHandler, PackageAclHandler, SystemAclHandler
public abstract class BaseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements AclHandler

BaseHandler is the base class for all Acl handlers and should be where we put common reusable methods.

aclIsSatellite

public boolean aclIsSatellite(java.lang.Object ctx,
                              java.lang.String[] params)
returns true if satellite, false if spacewalk

Parameters:
ctx - Our current context, containing a crid or cfid.
params - nothing
Returns:
true if satellite, false if spacewalk

getAsLong

public java.lang.Long getAsLong(java.lang.Object o)
Returns a Long object from the given object. We expect a String[] or String as the input all others return null;

Parameters:
o - object to be converted
Returns:
Long if object is parsable, or null.
